entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using `ModelBuilder.Entity` in `DbContext.OnModelCreating` for an owned entity type results in a `System.InvalidOperationException` #29869
  • Issue with nested owned types and nullability #29868
  • Reverse-engineer sequence columns #29863
  • Owned value object not materialized after using Linq To SQL Union #29862
  • Add more validation for shared rows #29860

Closed

  • Linq query is throwing exception "could not be translated. Either rewrite the query in a form that can be translated... #29829
  • sql error when using CancellationToken and cancelling it fast multiple times #29861
  • API for raw JSONPATH queries #28824

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Revert shared columns validation breaking change #29867
    Servicing-consider
  • Don't validate shared columns have the same provider type unless they are used in a key, foreign key or a unique index #29866
  • Most of explicit and lazy loading for no-tracking queries #29865
  • Allow SQLServer Sequence/HiLo on non-key properties #29864

Merged

  • Don't try to discover FK properties when conflicting with 2 or more other FKs #29849
  • SQLite Scaffolding: Reverse engineer collation #29857

Updated

  • Avoid redundant looping in property metadata #29805
  • [release/7.0] Avoid infinite loop during foreign key discovery #29850
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Avoid redundant looping in property metadata #29807
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Scaffolding: Handle FK on keyless entity type #29779
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Include table name for overrides in snapshot. #29820
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Allow underscores in identifiers again #29822
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Scaffolding: Fix code for EF6 many-to-many pattern #29793
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Scaffolding: Fix missing HasForeignKey when principal key is an alternate key #29731
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.3
